thread.title: Shatto milk turns blue with Royal's fever
thread.title_full: Shatto milk turns blue with Royal's fever - KCTV5

author: Donovan Pimentel, Digital producer
title: Shatto milk turns blue with Royal's fever
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - Royal's fever will be turning the fountains blue soon, along with some milk.
Shatto Milk Company's fourth milk limited edition release of the year is royal blue!
Shatto already makes a baby blue milk that's cotton candy flavored, but this limited edition will be "french vanilla" flavored.
"We are so excited to offer this limited run product for our customers as well as in honor of our hometown team. Cheers," the company wrote.
It hits shelves Monday and Tuesday, just in time for the playoffs.
